summary.overview: This JCL job performs a complete refresh of the disclosure group master file for the CARDDEMO application. It deletes any existing disclosure group data, creates a new indexed VSAM file structure, and loads current disclosure group information from a sequential source file.
business_functions: Delete existing disclosure group master file to ensure clean data setup
Create new indexed file structure for disclosure group data with 16-byte key and 50-byte records
Load disclosure group data from sequential source file into indexed VSAM file for efficient access

DISCGRP.jcl.program_overview: IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM file management and data operations
